# Ament Law Group, P.C.

> Ament Law Group is a full-service law firm in Murrysville, Pennsylvania, serving families and businesses across six counties in Western Pennsylvania. The firm focuses on estate planning, probate and trust administration, real estate settlement, business law, and elder law and Medicaid planning.

## Practice Areas

- [Estate Planning](/practice-areas/estate-planning/): Wills, trusts, powers of attorney, healthcare directives, beneficiary designation review
- [Probate & Trust Administration](/practice-areas/probate-administration/): Estate administration, executor guidance, inheritance tax filings, trust administration
- [Real Estate Settlement](/practice-areas/real-estate-law/): Title search, title insurance, settlement, deed preparation, transfer tax
- [Buyer Representation](/practice-areas/buyer-representation/): Agreement of sale review, inspection negotiation, closing representation
- [For Sale By Owner](/practice-areas/for-sale-by-owner/): FSBO legal services, agreement drafting, disclosures, closing
- [Real Estate Legal Services](/practice-areas/real-estate-services/): Lease drafting, landlord-tenant, assessment appeals, investment guidance
- [Business Formation](/practice-areas/business-formation/): LLCs, corporations, partnerships, operating agreements, compliance
- [Business Services](/practice-areas/business-law/): Contracts, corporate records, buy-sell agreements, succession planning
- [Elder Law & Medicaid](/practice-areas/elder-law/): Medicaid planning, asset protection, guardianship, long-term care planning

## Billing

Ament Law Group operates on a flat-fee billing model for most services. Consultations are available to discuss specific needs and pricing.

## Differentiators

- Flat-fee billing (no hourly surprises)
- Attorneys personally conduct every real estate settlement
- Licensed Pennsylvania title insurance agents on staff
- 100% employer-paid health insurance and 401k matching for employees
- Multi-generational firm with deep community roots in Murrysville
- Five attorneys covering estate planning, real estate, business, and elder law
